title: Why was I disconnected Riot?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: Hi LOL Team, I'd like to know why I was disconnected, looks like my internet was fine, could connect to everything else, restarted all of my equipment and the client, using ethernet. Was pretty annoyed, this is a loss in my history and yet should have been a easy win for Jaxx in URF. Really looks like a LOL issue.

replies.body: Heck, I was probably reported by my team as AFK...
